---
title: Auto generated Lot Numbers
---

# Auto generated Lot Numbers


Lot numbers can be auto generated for items from the **Item** profile by checking the option **Auto-generate 
 Lot Numbers** (path: **Item**  profile > **Inventory** tab).


{:.see_also}
See also
: [Lot Tracking  Preferences]({{site.wm_baseurl}}/lot-number-tracking/lot_tracking_preferences.html)
